nodes.text: The Oasis Republic Post was a security checkpoint in the Ancient Stasis Zone in the Tomb, an ancient Rakata prison on the planet Belsavis. The checkpoint remained active and manned by Rakata warden droids thousands of years after the collapse of the Infinite Empire, and the droids allowed Republic forces to visit the outpost without attacking.
The Oasis Republic Post is the northern Republic base in the Tomb on the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
